item.title: European Central Bank Cuts Interest Rates Marking Sixth Cut In 9 Months - SPDR S&P 500 (ARCASPY)
item.author: benzinga.com
item.description: The European Central Bank on Thursday cut interest rates as expected and acknowledged that monetary policy is becoming "meaningfully less restrictive." The Details: The Governing Council lowered its three key interest rates by 25 basis points, bringing the deposit facility rate to 2.50%, the main re...
